attributes.action: Ammend the legislation regarding Gravestones as Local Government are being to heavy Handed in the Implementation of it and upsetting a lot of Bereaved people by stupidly suggesting that Headstones under 3 feet high could fall over and kill a Child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have met People in Graveyards who are absolutely Distraught when finding Yellow Health & Safety  stickers on loved one's Graves.I also noticed that they are not being put on really old Graves only more recent one's.
  It looks to me like another way to raise money as apparantly the remedial work must be carried out by a Stonemason.
